title: The Defenseman's Second Chance
description: How many times do I have to repeat it?Second Chances Don't Work.Twenty years is a long time.Yet, she looks exactly the same.They say you never get over your first love.And, I'd have to agree with that statement.But,I've also never gotten over my first heartbreak.And, I don't believe that people change.The best thing for me - and my heart, is to stay far, far, away from the new girl in town.The Defenseman's Second Chance can be read as a standalone or as Book 6 in the Laketown Hockey Series.
author: A.J. Wynter
